column1: # This file defines FMI level identifiers for GRIB2 files. The main purpose
# of this file is to identify GRIB2 levels according to GRIB2 (header) fields so
# that we will get unique FMI level identifiers for them.
# Notice that this file contains default definitions that comes with
# the installation package. You should use another file for your own definitions
# (for example 'ext/fmi_levelId_grib2.csv'. Add the name of your file into the
# 'grid-files.conf' file so that the programs can find it.
